ing: 2 pounds fresh conch, removed from shell
1/2 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and chopped
des: "Fresh conch is delightfully prepared in this mild fresh ceviche with pineapple and cilantro. It smells and tastes great!"
ins: Trim and peel the conch, and cut into small cubes. Place into a large bowl with the water, lemon juice, cilantro, onion, pineapple, tomato and salt. Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour before serving.
